1 Training for BMW Group employees and temporary staff at consolidated companies worldwide. Data are collated on the basis of direct inputs of participants and, to a small extent, by extrapolation. Data also include e-learning formats.

2 Delivery figures presented for 2020 and 2021 are not directly comparable to those of previous years. See sales figures for deliveries in the section ↗ Comparison of Forecasts with Actual Outcomes for further information.
